data.title: Cameron's cabinet reshuffle: the full list of government ministers
data.meta_description: David Cameron has reshuffled his government, making over 50 appointments and overseeing the departures of 29 ministers. Here are the full lists of his new set of ministers and those leaving government
data.text: Alan Duncan DFID Minister of State Con Alistair Burt FCO Parliamentary Under Secretary of State Con Alistair Carmichael Whips (Hoc) Deputy Chief Whip (Comptroller of HM Household) Lib Andrew Lansley House of Commons Leader of the House of Commons, Lord Privy Seal Con New Andrew Mitchell Whips (Hoc) Chief Whip (Parliamentary Secretary to the Treasury) Con New Andrew Murrison MoD Parliamentary Under Secretary of State Con New Andrew Robathan MoD Minister of State Con New Anna Soubry DoH Parliamentary Under Secretary of State Con New Anne Milton Junior Lords of Treasury Government Whip (Lord Commissioner of HM Treasury) Con New Baroness Anelay of St Johns Whips (HoL) Lords Chief Whip (Captain of the Honourable Corps of Gentlemen at Arms) Con Baroness Garden Baronesses and Lords in Waiting Baroness in Waiting Lib Baroness Hanham DCLG Parliamentary Under Secretary of State Con Baroness Northover Baronesses and Lords in Waiting Baroness in Waiting Lib Baroness Randerson Wales Parliamentary Under Secretary of State Lib Baroness Stowell of Beeston Baronesses and Lords in Waiting Baroness in Waiting Con Baroness Verma Baronesses and Lords in Waiting Baroness in Waiting Con Baroness Warsi DCLG;
